title: American Cholo & Bozo on Racism Controversy, Tyga, Tariq Nasheed & More
description:
From an epic cultural moment with Tyga to getting serious backlash the next day for an old clip that resurfaced, Cholo came in with 50 people to press and put the blame on Adam and Flakko, here's what happened.
